text: Henry Wilcoxon (8 September 1905 â€“ 6 March 1984) was an Dominican-English silent movie actor. He was born in Roseau, Dominica. He was known for his role as Bishop Pickering in Caddyshack. He is also known for appearing as a leading man in Cecil B. DeMille's movies. Wilcoxon died in Los Angeles, California from cancer and heart failure, aged 78. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1905 births Category:1984 deaths Category:British silent movie actors Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors
title: Henry Wilcoxon
